alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Hill County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 9:47PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...An outflow wind boundary will impact portions of east central Pondera, southern Liberty, north central Fergus, southeastern Toole, southwestern Blaine, southwestern Hill and central Chouteau Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 946 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow wind boundary ahead of scattered thunderstorms along a line extending from near Conrad to near Geraldine. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conrad, Fort Benton, The Knees, Lothair, Loma, Kenilworth, Ledger, Tiber Dam, Judith Landing, Iliad and Virgelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Hill County
